title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 25.2 - Applicability of this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 25.2 - Applicability of this part

State Regulations

An application for a certificate of title, or certificate
of title and registration, will not be accepted for a new vehicle unless
accompanied by a certificate of origin. The commissioner may waive this
requirement upon good cause shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
25.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
